entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `GivenDotnetTest` Failures #46923
  • [ApiDiff] Change the default attributes to exclude to the ones we use for ref file generation #46922
  • Change in argument handling in `dotnet run` between 9.0.103 and 9.0.200 #46912
  • Randomly failing build due to missing SDK #46910
    Discussion
  • Unimplemented Tests: WorkloadSetInstallationRecordIsWrittenCorrectly and TurnOffWorkloadSetUpdateMode #46905

Closed

  • [ApiCompat] Not catching removal of abstract keyword #46794
  • SDK 9.0.x installation or update breaks VS 2022 #46828
  • IDE0040 error on interface after upgrading to .NET 9.0.200 #46778
  • Cannot convert from void to IEnumerable<byte> on SDK 9.0.200 #46801
  • 9.0.200 sdk has lots of dependencies on the 4.13.0.0 compiler which has not been released #46892

PullRequests

Created

  • Add installer tests project #46927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use package download in generate layout #46925
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make DefineStaticWebAssets incremental #46920
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Disable Flaky GivenDotnetTest Tests #46924
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Update code owners for R2R related code #46858
  • [ApiCompat] Warn if abstract keyword is removed from member #46797
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Validate Signing on Mac + Linux #46652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use package download in bundled dotnet tools #46914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Skip attribute with issue link for unimplemented tests #46907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in Crossgen.targets #46913
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #46908
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Logger and MSBuild --verbosity option to dotnet test #46909
    Area-dotnet test
  • Remove app host packages for different archs from packs folder #46911
    untriaged
  • Minor clean-up in redist-installer #46896
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't set explicit version for Microsoft.Build.NoTargets in project file #46894
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Avoid downloading unrelated arcade packages in DownloadPackages.csproj #46895
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Remove vertical priority list #46741
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Try to re-enable APICompat in aspnetcore #45872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix utility HaveStdErrContainingOnce #46893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not pass raw messages to string.Format #46479
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 9.0.3
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Use pipeline artifacts for final artifacts and enable caching #46796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • realpath in c# #45637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Write import map to html files #46233
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2645123 #46803
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add ExcludeFromCodeCoverage to template for MSTest, NUnit, XUnit #46866
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
